meanings: O형에 관한 표현 You are a person of vitality.
(공간이) be full (of), be filled (with), be crowded (with)
(좌석·정원 등이) be taken, be occupied, be full
(감정 등이) be full of, be filled with

vlive.korean: [오늘도 활기찬 마마무 대기실!] [The lively MAMAMOO waiting room!] View video MAMAMOO : [MMMTV4] EP31 HELLO JAKARTA
한창 활기찬 시간이에요. - 부엉이들. This is the most lively time. - Owls. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : [Special Clips] 여자친구 GFRIEND - DK 공기청정기 지면 광고 촬영 behind
vlive.english: This is the most lively time. - Owls.

vlive.korean: 그래서 굉장히 활기찬 분이라고 생각을 했어요 그때도. I thought you were a very lively person. 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#36. 여기 어떤가요 (w. 정은지)
vlive.english: I thought you were a very lively person.

vlive.korean: [활기찬 새벽한시 인사] 아 안녕하세요 골드니스~! [The energetic 1AM greeting] Goldenness, hello! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [Golden Child] 혼자 남은 우리 주쨔의 명품 주빛밤✨✨ (JOOCHAN’s alone radio V)
내일 모레도 화이팅! - 활기찬 하루 보내십시오! Work hard the day after, too! - Have a lively day! 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 졸음방지 브이라이브 Zzz
vlive.english: Work hard the day after, too! - Have a lively day!
